sys_script_include.description: Client sends a dummy event via mid server to test EDA webhook connectivity.
sys_script_include.name: EdaEventMidServerAjax

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_b047e90187047d505d60da083cbb3573
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>x_rhtpp_eda.EdaEventMidServerAjax</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description>Client sends a dummy event via mid server to test EDA webhook connectivity.</description> <name>EdaEventMidServerAjax</name> <script><![CDATA[var EdaEventMidServerAjax = Class.create(); EdaEventMidServerAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
send: function() { var mid = new EdaEventMidServer(); return mid.send(this.getParameter('mid_server'), this.getParameter('url'), this.getParameter('token'), '{"ServiceNow":"ping"}', 'ping', 'test'); }, type: 'EdaEventMidServerAjax' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>bill_wei</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-07-13 18:25:12</sys_created_on> <sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update> <sys_id>b047e90187047d505d60da083cbb3573</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>EdaEventMidServerAjax</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Event-Driven Ansible Notification Service" source="x_rhtpp_eda">cb4182e69767611049b0b9dfe153af15</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade> <sys_scope display_value="Event-Driven Ansible Notification Service">cb4182e69767611049b0b9dfe153af15</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b047e90187047d505d60da083cbb3573</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>bill_wei</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-07-14 16:09:21</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
